text: Mehmet Doğan Cüceloğlu (9 February 1938 – 16 February 2021) was a Turkish academic in Media psychology and writer. He was a visiting professor at University of California, Berkeley. From 1980 until 1996, he worked at the California State University, Fullerton. During this time, he published his first book İnsan İnsana ("Human To Human"). Cüceloğlu died at his home in Istanbul on 16 February 2021, seven days after his 83rd birthday from an aortic dissection. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Turkish writers Category:California State University faculty Category:Psychologists Category:Turkish scientists
title: Doğan Cüceloğlu
